_instructions.info: Edit this presentation structure as needed
rules: Keep the JSON syntax valid (use a JSON validator if needed)
Preserve the structure: title, slides array
Each slide must have: title, bullet_points (array)
Save the file when done and return to the CLI

presentation.title: OpenAI Dev Day 2025: The Future of AI Development

slides.title: Introduction: The Tech Stack Revolution
bullet_points: Sam Altman announces game-changing features at OpenAI Dev Day 2025
Six major announcements that will transform AI app development
ChatGPT evolving into an app platform/operating system
800 million weekly active users represent massive distribution opportunity

slides.title: ChatGPT Apps Platform
bullet_points: Third attempt after GPT plugins and GPTs failed to gain traction
ChatGPT as operating system - no need for traditional apps
Current trials with major apps like Zillow
Potential benefits but also UI complexity concerns

slides.title: API Updates & New Models
bullet_points: SORA2 and GPT-5 Pro now available in API
Sora 2: 50 cents per second of high-quality video
New smaller, more affordable models for voice/image generation
Cost-effective options for AI-powered features

slides.title: Developer Tools Revolution
bullet_points: GitHub Action for Codex automates code reviews
Automatic security scanning and documentation generation
Streamlines development workflow
Saves time on repetitive coding tasks

slides.title: Agent Kit: No-Code AI Development
bullet_points: Unified platform for building, deploying, and optimizing AI agents
Flowchart-style canvas for visual app logic
Empowers non-engineers to build complex applications
Potential complexity ceiling limitations for advanced projects

slides.title: Industry Impact & Competition
bullet_points: JetBrains launches Juni AI coding agent
Deep codebase context understanding
Integration with GitHub and external platforms
Growing AI development tool ecosystem

slides.title: Key Takeaways & Future Outlook
bullet_points: AI development becoming more accessible and automated
Major shift from traditional apps to AI-powered platforms
Early adopters positioned for significant opportunities
Balance between automation and developer control needed
